name: Steam Tractor Mastery
description:
Lets go back into the time and try how tractor was like a few decade ago.How the managed this beautiful piece of invention on the tracks that are full of obstacles which makes the ride really difficult. You have to be daring enough to ride your steam tractor to overcome all the obstacles and knock out all your missions during the ride.
* Fantastic graphics
* Precise physics simulation
* Thrilling gameplay
* Easy controls
publishers: Al Khawarizmi Software Development and Services
